Name: Porn Star Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Wash and cut 2 fresh passion fruits in half.
SCOOP out the seeds and flesh from 3 of the passion fruit halves into your shaker.
Add the next 4 ingredients (all but the sparkling wine).
Float the remaining passion fruit half for garnish.
Optionally, separately POUR the sparkling wine into a chilled shot glass to serve alongside the cocktail.
Review: A passion fruit and vanilla crowd-pleaser that's balanced with zesty lime, often served with sparkling wine on the side.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Douglas Ankrah at The Townhouse bar in Knightsbridge, London. Douglas also founded London's LAB bar which is perhaps more associated with this cocktail. This cocktail was originally named the Maverick Martini after a nightclub in Cape Town, South Africa which Douglas frequented, a story he recounts in his 2004 book, Shaken & Stirred .
